trans-unit.source: This topic shows the hierarchy of objects that are part of Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE).
trans-unit.target: This topic shows the hierarchy of objects that are part of Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell ISE is included in Windows PowerShell 3.0 and in Windows PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell ISE is included in Windows PowerShell 3.0 and in Windows PowerShell 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Click an object to take you to the reference documentation for the class that defines the object.
trans-unit.target: Click an object to take you to the reference documentation for the class that defines the object.

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE** object is the [root object](The-ObjectModelRoot-Object.md) of the Windows PowerShell ISE object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE** object is the [root object](The-ObjectModelRoot-Object.md) of the Windows PowerShell ISE object hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Located at the top level, it makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: Located at the top level, it makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.CurrentFile** object is an instance of the [ISEFile](The-ISEFile-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.CurrentFile** object is an instance of the [ISEFile](The-ISEFile-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: **[$psISE.CurrentFile.Editor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEEditor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: **[$psISE.CurrentFile.Editor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEEditor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab** object is an instance of the [PowerShellTab](The-PowerShellTab-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab** object is an instance of the [PowerShellTab](The-PowerShellTab-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: **[$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu](The-ISEMenuItem-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEMenuItem](The-ISEMenuItem-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: **[$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.AddOnsMenu](The-ISEMenuItem-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEMenuItem](The-ISEMenuItem-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: **[$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.ConsolePane](The-ISEEditor-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEEditor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: **[$psISE.CurrentPowerShellTab.ConsolePane](The-ISEEditor-Object.md)** This object is an instance of the [ISEEditor](The-ISEEditor-Object.md) class and makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.CurrentVisibleHorizontalTool** object is an instance of the [ISEAddOnTool](The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md) class.
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.CurrentVisibleHorizontalTool** object is an instance of the [ISEAddOnTool](The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md) class.

trans-unit.source: It represents the installed add-on tool that is currently docked to the top edge of the Windows PowerShell ISE window.
trans-unit.target: It represents the installed add-on tool that is currently docked to the top edge of the Windows PowerShell ISE window.

trans-unit.source: This object makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: This object makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.CurrentVisibleHorizontalTool** object is an instance of the [ISEAddOnTool](The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md) class.
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.CurrentVisibleHorizontalTool** object is an instance of the [ISEAddOnTool](The-ISEAddOnTool-Object.md) class.

trans-unit.source: It represents the installed add-on tool that is currently docked to the right-hand edge of the Windows PowerShell ISE window.
trans-unit.target: It represents the installed add-on tool that is currently docked to the right-hand edge of the Windows PowerShell ISE window.

trans-unit.source: This object makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: This object makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.Options** object makes the following objects available for scripting:
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.Options** object makes the following objects available for scripting:

trans-unit.source: The **$psISE.PowerShellTabs** object is an instance of the [PowerShellTabCollection](The-PowerShellTabCollection-Object.md) class.
trans-unit.target: The **$psISE.PowerShellTabs** object is an instance of the [PowerShellTabCollection](The-PowerShellTabCollection-Object.md) class.

trans-unit.source: It is a collection of all the currently open PowerShell tabs that represent the available Windows PowerShell run environments on the local computer or on connected remote computers.
trans-unit.target: It is a collection of all the currently open PowerShell tabs that represent the available Windows PowerShell run environments on the local computer or on connected remote computers.

trans-unit.source: Each member in the collection is an instance of the [PowerShellTab](The-PowerShellTab-Object.md) class.
trans-unit.target: Each member in the collection is an instance of the [PowerShellTab](The-PowerShellTab-Object.md) class.
